title: There's LESS Room On The CAKE
body_text:
After as many memorable moments, verbal debates, hyped events, busted fingers, and countless friendships, what more could possibly be said? By now, it's become a historical, lifelong story that will surely be shared upon any forthcoming generations. We've dedicated our time, sacrificed our bodies, and rendered our finances in collective effort to preserve this incredible journey.
Six glorious years - that's just astounding.
The Six Years Gone By: A Retrospective
2005, 2006 ..
The lengthy list of legendary framers began during Labor Day weekend. From Tronolone, DiBuccio, Adams, and Winston to Pierce, Spengeman, Krott, and McCrorey, believe me when I say there's plenty more: Fitzpatrick, Bertsch, Mills, Carty, DeCuir, Katz .. nearly endless I tell you!
Emanating from
East Coast Dodgeball
's then-home Ocean Road Park, the 2005 era is often viewed [by those who experienced it] as the most unforgettable.
The newly-formed bonds and thrilling games from the previous year carried right over to a full calendar. This was a competitive 12-month span that witnessed the first-time appearances of future stars Edwards, Basista, Butler, Kerr, and Smalls while Megill, Stopa, and Letsche - each future
ECDElite
Hall of Famers - joined the crowd on a continual basis.
Game alterations were also made during this period with the
Last Man Standing Three-Minute Timer
,
Captains Championship
encounters, and secondary pregame attractions like the
Battle Royal
and
Rimshot Contest
. The permanent uses of the Wall High School tennis courts as well as the deadly bulletballs were also widely accepted.
Notable 2005 Events:
1
,
2
,
7
,
X
,
XONE & XTWO
,
X6
,
20
Notable 2006 Events:
TWENTY-TWO
,
30
,
XL
,
41
,
49
,
50
,
54 | OYA
,
LX3
,
LXIV
,
70
.. 2007, 2008 ..
ECD
's level of innovation undoubtedly reached a peak during this creatively-influential time frame, particularly in 2007. Captains were not only getting hit with dodge balls, but a whipped cream-filled pie too! The brutal
BoxBall Dodgeball
,
Pick Your Poison
and
GodMode Rules
stipulations, the anticipated
Wall vs. All
wars,
EnduraDodgeball
,
SuperMario Dodgeball
.. geez, what more could a player possibly ask for!
If that wasn't enough, the wave of unfamiliar warriors did not slow either. Cornero, Londono, Vetrano, Wolf, Teitelbaum, Yochum, among others became the newest
ECD
acquisitions. I call this a "rebirth" of sorts, not that the game necessarily needed it.
Notable 2007 Events:
71
,
Toms River Tournament I
,
79
,
LXXXI
,
85
,
90
,
93
,
96
,
100
,
105
,
108
,
CX
,
CXV
,
118 & 119
.
Notable 2008 Events:
123
,
125
,
C30
,
CXL | Family Affair I
,
CXLV
,
150
,
151
,
154 | 3YA
,
155
,
156
,
CLX
,
164
,
CLX5
.. 2009, 2010 ..
In the midst of Tronolone's 18-month hiatus, the eldest Adams picked up the key to the kingdom and managed to plan a successful string of events. The action and intensity did not cease for the diehard core and upon Tronolone's return,
ECD
remained in high standard on a month-to-month schedule.
Soon, dedicated legends were being inducted as charter members into the prestigious
ECDElite
Hall of Fame. Many rivalries were renewed while others ignited, stipulations occasionally returned to spruce up each outing, and bonds grew stronger than ever. Throw in some fiery competition from Oberto, Lima, Jacobs, Travassos, and Casbarro and there is no questioning
ECD
's enduring travels had all come together.
Notable 2010 Events:
Family Affair III
,
Immaculate Redemption
,
5 Year Anniversary
,
Divorce Court
,
Wall Brawl
.. 2011
The past six magical years have brought all of us to this. It's time to blow out the celebratory candles when past and present warriors of
East Coast Dodgeball
rejoice in the triumph they all helped create.
________________________________________
___________________
ANNIVERSARY 6: "Preview" Preview!
"MoneyMaker" Rimshot Contest!
Test your aim in a little prematch fun! For a measly $2, competitors will have the chance to leave ANNIVERSARY 6 with a little dough by capturing the cherished
Rimshot Contest
crown. The 50/50 prize will be split between both the winner of the pregame attraction and financial assistance in the purchase of new dodge balls.
ECDElitist Fourteen!
The
ECD
community has been steaming with rumors, all in curiosity to this special on-count ceremony. Joining the likes of iconic 2011 inductees Lauren Stopa and John Tronolone, the fourteenth member of the
ECDElite
Hall of Fame will be revealed live!
The MAIN EVENT .. ?? vs. ??
Due to the sudden postponement of ANNIVERSARY 6, the original main event slated for the spectacle has be changed. Who will occupy the coveted spots under the magnificent lights? Check back by week's end to find out!
Invite the family, bring a friend - I simply ask you to come on out to help commemorate this special occasion. You will not be disappointed!
body_html:
After as many memorable moments, verbal debates, hyped events, busted fingers, and countless friendships, what more could possibly be said? By now, it's become a historical, lifelong story that will surely be shared upon any forthcoming generations. We've dedicated our time, sacrificed our bodies, and rendered our finances in collective effort to preserve this incredible journey.

Six glorious years - that's just astounding.

The Six Years Gone By: A Retrospective

2005, 2006 ..
The lengthy list of legendary framers began during Labor Day weekend. From Tronolone, DiBuccio, Adams, and Winston to Pierce, Spengeman, Krott, and McCrorey, believe me when I say there's plenty more: Fitzpatrick, Bertsch, Mills, Carty, DeCuir, Katz .. nearly endless I tell you!

Emanating from East Coast Dodgeball's then-home Ocean Road Park, the 2005 era is often viewed [by those who experienced it] as the most unforgettable.

The newly-formed bonds and thrilling games from the previous year carried right over to a full calendar. This was a competitive 12-month span that witnessed the first-time appearances of future stars Edwards, Basista, Butler, Kerr, and Smalls while Megill, Stopa, and Letsche - each future ECDElite Hall of Famers - joined the crowd on a continual basis.

Game alterations were also made during this period with the Last Man Standing Three-Minute Timer, Captains Championship encounters, and secondary pregame attractions like the Battle Royal and Rimshot Contest. The permanent uses of the Wall High School tennis courts as well as the deadly bulletballs were also widely accepted.

  • Notable 2005 Events: 1, 2, 7, X, XONE & XTWO, X6, 20
  • Notable 2006 Events: TWENTY-TWO, 30, XL, 41, 49, 50, 54 | OYA, LX3, LXIV, 70

    .. 2007, 2008 ..
    ECD's level of innovation undoubtedly reached a peak during this creatively-influential time frame, particularly in 2007. Captains were not only getting hit with dodge balls, but a whipped cream-filled pie too! The brutal BoxBall Dodgeball, Pick Your Poison and GodMode Rules stipulations, the anticipated Wall vs. All wars, EnduraDodgeball, SuperMario Dodgeball .. geez, what more could a player possibly ask for!

    If that wasn't enough, the wave of unfamiliar warriors did not slow either. Cornero, Londono, Vetrano, Wolf, Teitelbaum, Yochum, among others became the newest ECD acquisitions. I call this a "rebirth" of sorts, not that the game necessarily needed it.

  • Notable 2007 Events: 71, Toms River Tournament I, 79, LXXXI, 85, 90, 93, 96, 100, 105, 108, CX, CXV, 118 & 119.
  • Notable 2008 Events: 123, 125, C30, CXL | Family Affair I, CXLV, 150, 151, 154 | 3YA, 155, 156, CLX, 164, CLX5

    .. 2009, 2010 ..
    In the midst of Tronolone's 18-month hiatus, the eldest Adams picked up the key to the kingdom and managed to plan a successful string of events. The action and intensity did not cease for the diehard core and upon Tronolone's return, ECD remained in high standard on a month-to-month schedule.

    Soon, dedicated legends were being inducted as charter members into the prestigious ECDElite Hall of Fame. Many rivalries were renewed while others ignited, stipulations occasionally returned to spruce up each outing, and bonds grew stronger than ever. Throw in some fiery competition from Oberto, Lima, Jacobs, Travassos, and Casbarro and there is no questioning ECD's enduring travels had all come together.

  • Notable 2010 Events: Family Affair III, Immaculate Redemption, 5 Year Anniversary, Divorce Court, Wall Brawl

    .. 2011
    The past six magical years have brought all of us to this. It's time to blow out the celebratory candles when past and present warriors of East Coast Dodgeball rejoice in the triumph they all helped create.


    ___________________________________________________________

    ANNIVERSARY 6: "Preview" Preview!

    "MoneyMaker" Rimshot Contest!
    Test your aim in a little prematch fun! For a measly $2, competitors will have the chance to leave ANNIVERSARY 6 with a little dough by capturing the cherished Rimshot Contest crown. The 50/50 prize will be split between both the winner of the pregame attraction and financial assistance in the purchase of new dodge balls.

    ECDElitist Fourteen!
    The ECD community has been steaming with rumors, all in curiosity to this special on-count ceremony. Joining the likes of iconic 2011 inductees Lauren Stopa and John Tronolone, the fourteenth member of the ECDElite Hall of Fame will be revealed live!

    The MAIN EVENT .. ?? vs. ??
    Due to the sudden postponement of ANNIVERSARY 6, the original main event slated for the spectacle has be changed. Who will occupy the coveted spots under the magnificent lights? Check back by week's end to find out!

    Invite the family, bring a friend - I simply ask you to come on out to help commemorate this special occasion. You will not be disappointed!
